duties_responsibilities.duty: Structural design of steel structures for offshore oil and gas facilities, including platforms, skids, risers, and tanks.
Perform analysis of structural systems, including in-place, loadout, transportation, installation, fatigue, and non-linear analysis.
Design of structural elements such as trunnions, mudmats, pipe supports, and jackets to pile connections.
Prepare RFIs, CTRs, and reports related to structural design.
Reference industry and project-specific standards and codes, and interface with interdisciplinary teams.
Research, learn, and implement differing design techniques, and perform necessary field work for accurate information.

education_certification.credential: BS in Structural or Civil Engineering (1-5 years' experience)
